name: npc_dota_hero_chaos_knight
bio_loc:
The veteran of countless battles on a thousand worlds, Chaos Knight hails from a far upstream plane where the fundamental laws of the universe have found sentient expression. Of all the ancient Fundamentals, he is the oldest and most tireless, endlessly searching out a being he knows only as "The Light." Long ago the Light ventured out from the progenitor realm, in defiance of the first covenant. Now Chaos Knight shifts from plane to plane, always on the hunt to extinguish the Light wherever he finds it. A thousand times he has snuffed out the source, and always he slides into another plane to continue his search anew.

Upon his steed Armageddon he rides, wading into battle with maniacal frenzy, drawing strength from the disorder of the universe. A physical manifestation of chaos itself, in times of need he calls upon other versions of himself from other planes, and together these dark horsemen ride into battle, as unstoppable as any force of nature. Only when the last Light of the world is scoured from existence will the search be ended. Where rides the Chaos Knight, death soon follows.
hype_loc: Chaos Knight is an army unto himself. Able to summon a cavalry of clones to demolish enemy defenses, should an enemy present itself, he can rift reality to pull him and his phantasms close enough to rain brutal cudgel blows upon their head.
npe_desc_loc: Has strong but random damage output

facets.description_loc: All Chaos Knight Illusions are Strong Illusions and take less damage when near him.
facets.name: chaos_knight_strong_illusions

facets.description_loc: Reality Rift has equal chances of applying Break, Disarm, or Nothing for {s:bonus_additional_debuff_duration_percent}% of the base debuff duration in addition to its normal effects.
facets.name: chaos_knight_irrationality

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt
abilities.desc_loc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
notes_loc: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Chaos Bolt to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target. This illusion deals %illusion_damage_reduction_pct%%% less damage.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reality_rift
abilities.desc_loc: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for %duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
notes_loc: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.
abilities.shard_loc: Allows Reality Rift to be cast on any enemy hero that is within 1200 range of you or one of your illusions. Gathers all of your illusions and your hero and teleports them to the target enemy.
facets_loc: Reality Rift has equal chances of applying Break, Disarm, or Nothing for %additional_debuff_duration_percent%%% of the base debuff duration in addition to its normal effects.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength with bonus lifesteal. Deals %creep_multiplier%x damage to creeps, but lifesteal from creeps is reduced by %creep_lifesteal_reduction_pct%%%.
abilities.lore_loc: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reins_of_chaos
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever illusions of Chaos Knight are created, there is a %bonus_illusion_chance%%% chance that an additional %bonus_illusion_count% extra illusion will spawn.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_phantasm
abilities.desc_loc:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are illusions that deal %outgoing_damage_tooltip%%% damage, but take %incoming_damage_tooltip%%% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
notes_loc: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
Chaos Knight is invulnerable for %invuln_duration% seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
abilities.scepter_loc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_phantasmagoria
abilities.desc_loc: All Chaos Knight Illusions are Strong Illusions and take less damage when near him.
notes_loc: All illusions created by Chaos Knight or of Chaos Knight are Strong Illusions. Chaos Knight's Illusions within %aura_radius% radius have %damage_reduction_pct%%% damage reduction.
Also applies to Aghanim's Scepter Phantasm Illusions.
Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
